thread.section_title: Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Manhattan/Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: First trip to NY, pleasantly surprised
thread.title_full: First trip to NY, pleasantly surprised - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Manhattan/Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Leigh T
title: First trip to NY, pleasantly surprised
text: The hotel was very nice. The lobby was beautifully decorated. The rooms were small but nice. Everything was very clean and well kept. The elevators were very slow, there were three operating at all times, but it was a busy place. Breakfast was very nice and actually very spacious I thought. There is NO parking aside from valet which was VERY expensive, $65.00 per 24 hours for my SUV. We really had no other option, but it worked out ok as we rode the subway to most all of our destinations. The hotel is also within walking distance to Times Square which was great. I would definitely recommend this hotel.
